citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00am on 04-
AUG-23. The inspector knocked on the door, sent a text message since the voicemail was full, and waited 30 minutes
before departing the facility. The licensee later responded by text that he was out of town that day.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00am on 04-
AUG-23. The inspector knocked on the door, sent a text message since the voicemail was full, and waited 30 minutes 
before departing the facility. The licensee later responded by text that he was out of town that day. 
 
 
End Section
